column4: It seems the nvidia module is missing for me in dapper amd64 (kernel 2.6.15) - Anyone know anything about this?
it is installed but it doesnt work out of the box, have the same problem here, dont know how to fix it, will be kinda hard
Is there a bug report about it? And do you know if an earlier kernel works?
after the update to dapper i didnt get it to work, with older kernels 2, ithinks its just a matter of waiting till theres a update for it
